markdown.markdown:
In each course, I strive to cultivate an [inclusive and equitable classroom](inclusion.html) and to ground the methodology in data ethics.


**STAT/COMP 112: Intro to Data Science**

-   Topics: Foundational Data Visualization \& Data Wrangling
-   [[F22](https://bcheggeseth.github.io/112_fall_2022/)], [[S23](https://bcheggeseth.github.io/112_spring_2023/)], [[F23](https://bcheggeseth.github.io/112_fall_2023/)]

**STAT 155: Intro to Statistical Modeling**

-   Topics: Linear \& Logistic Regression Models, Uncertainty (hypothesis testing, confidence intervals)
-   [Course notes](https://bcheggeseth.github.io/Stat155Notes/) in collaboration with Leslie Myint and Kelsey Grinde
-   [F18], [F19], [F20]

**STAT 253: Statistical Machine Learning**

-   Topics: Regression, Classification, Clustering
-   Textbook: An Introduction to Statistical Learning by James, Witten, Hastie, and Tibshirani
-   [[F21]](https://bcheggeseth.github.io/253_fall_2021/), [S24]

**STAT 452: Correlated Data**

-   Topics: Covariance/Correlation functions and matrices, time series (ARMA models), longitudinal (marginal and mixed effects models), spatial
-   [Course notes](https://bcheggeseth.github.io/CorrelatedData/)
-   [S19], [F19], [[S22](https://bcheggeseth.github.io/452_spring_2022/)],[[F23](https://bcheggeseth.github.io/452_fall_2023/)]

**STAT 455: Mathematical Statistics**

-   Topics: Properties of estimators, Estimation techniques, mathematical properties of uncertainty estimates
-   [S19]

**STAT/COMP 456: Projects in Data Science**

-   Topics: Advanced DS skills, Data Science process
-   [S23]



## Williams College

**STAT 101: Elementary Statistics & Data Analysis** 

- Textbook: Intro Stats by De Veaux, Velleman, and Bock

**STAT 201: Statistics & Data Analysis** 

- Textbook: Stats: Data and Models by De Veaux, Velleman, and Bock

**STAT 202: Introduction to Statistical Modeling** 

- Textbook: Stat2 by Cannon et al.

**STAT 10: Data Visualization** 

- Winter Study course 
- Textbooks: ggplot2 by Hadley Wickham, Interactive Data Visualization for the Web: An Introduction to Designing with D3 by Scott Murray

**STAT 355: Multivariate Data Analysis** 

- Textbook: An Introduction to Statistical Learning by James, Witten, Hastie, and Tibshirani

**STAT 346: Regression and Forecasting** 

- Textbook: Applied Linear Regression Models by Kutner, Nachtsheim, and Neter

**STAT 372: Longitudinal Data Analysis** 

- Developed course materials

**STAT 442: Data Mining and Computational Statistics** 

- Textbooks: An Introduction to Statistical Learning by James, Witten, Hastie, and Tibshirani and Weapons of Math Destruction: How Big Data Increases Inequality and Threatens Democracy by Cathy O'Neil

## University of California Berkeley

**STAT 2: Introduction to Statistics** 

- Instructor 
- Textbook: Statistics by Freedman, Pisani, and Purves

**STAT 153: Introduction to Time Series** 

- Graduate Student Instructor (Supervisor: Adityanand Guntuboyina) 
- Textbook: The Analysis of Time Series, An Introduction by Chris Chatfield

**STAT 153: Introduction to Time Series**

**MATH 10: Methods of Mathematics** 

- Graduate Student Assistant, Curriculum Development 
- Supervisors: Lior Patcher, Bernd Sturmfels


**Exploration in Statistics** 

- Graduate Student Instructor
